pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating the Sample Mean and Standard Deviation from Commonly Reported Quantiles in Meta-Analysis // Implements the methods of McGrath et al. (2019) arXiv:1903.10498 for estimating the sample mean and standard deviation from commonly reported quantiles in meta-analysis. These methods can be applied to studies that report the sample median, sample size, and one or both of (i) the sample minimum and maximum values and (ii) the first and third quartiles.
